title: Lancelot
body:
<<Lancelot>>
Well, hello there, new guardian!
...

<<Tala>> 
Hi there! I’m Tala!
...

<<Lancelot>>
Great adventure in front of you! But be careful, something’s wrong outside…
As you can see, beside me is a [b]Nightmare[/b], something that us the Guardians of Dreams must dispatch.
I think they are everywhere… But I don’t know why… I wish I could know it in the [b]Dreaming Kingdom[/b].
...

<<Tala>> 
Hmmm… I think you can let me figure this out! Let me go there and know why.
...

<<Lancelot>>
Ohhh thank goodness! Thank you for your kindness, new guardian!
...

<<Tala>> 
No worries…
